name: Pixel Match 3D
description:
Can you think symmetrically?

A simple paper art game, "Pixel Match 3D"!

▼ EASY TO PLAY

◆ Shape the folded paper
Shape the folded paper to match the given design.
The trick is to think symmetrical.

◆ Match the design
Unfold your paper when finished.
Were you able to match it?
